languages.text: "Так Фелек... сорвал свою маску именно потому, что знал о бедах Райкад Минорис. И был уверен, что никто из союзников не придет нам на помощь". {n}Девушка сокрушенно вздыхает.{/n} "Продолжай свой рапорт, плебс".

"Then Felek tore off his mask... precisely because he knew about the trouble on Rykad Minoris. He knew that none of our allies would come to our aid." {n}Cassia lets out a sorrowful sigh.{/n} "You may continue your report, peasant."
languages.original_text: "Так Фелек... сорвал свою маску именно потому, что знал о бедах Райкад Минорис. И был уверен, что никто из союзников не придет нам на помощь". {n}Девушка сокрушенно вздыхает.{/n} "Продолжай свой рапорт, плебс".

traits.locale_text: "Then Felek tore off his mask... precisely because he knew about the trouble on Rykad Minoris. He knew that none of our allies would come to our help." {n}Cassia lets out a sorrowful sigh.{/n} "You may continue your report, peasant."

"Then Felek tore off his mask... precisely because he knew about the trouble on Rykad Minoris. He knew that none of our allies would come to our help." {n}Cassia lets out a sorrowful sigh.{/n} "You may continue your report, peasant."

"Then Felek tore off his mask... precisely because he knew about the trouble on Rykad Minoris. He knew that none of our allies would come to our aid." {n}Cassia lets out a sorrowful sigh.{/n} "You may continue your report, peasant."

"Then Felek tore off his mask... precisely because he knew about the trouble on Rykad Minoris. He knew that none of our allies would come to our aid." {n}Cassia lets out a sorrowful sigh.{/n} "You may continue your report, peasant."

"Then Felek tore off his mask... precisely because he knew about the trouble on Rykad Minoris. He knew that none of our allies would come to our aid." {n}Cassia lets out a sorrowful sigh.{/n} "You may continue your report, peasant."

languages.text: "Dann hat Felek seine Maske abgenommen ... weil er von den Problemen auf Rykad Minoris wusste. Er wusste, dass uns keiner unserer Verbündeten zu Hilfe eilen würde." {n}Cassia stößt ein trauriges Seufzen aus.{/n} "Ihr könnt mit Eurem Bericht fortfahren, Bauer."
languages.original_text: "Then Felek tore off his mask... precisely because he knew about the trouble on Rykad Minoris. He knew that none of our allies would come to our aid." {n}Cassia lets out a sorrowful sigh.{/n} "You may continue your report, peasant."

traits.locale_text: "Dann hat Felek seine Maske abgenommen ... weil er von den Problemen auf Rykad Minoris wusste. Er wusste, dass uns keiner unserer Verbündeten zu Hilfe eilen würde." {n}Cassie stößt ein trauriges Seufzen aus.{/n} "Ihr könnt mit Eurem Bericht fortfahren, Bauer."

languages.text: « Felek a tombé le masque, alors... précisément parce qu'il était au courant des problèmes sur Rykad Minoris. Il savait que nous ne pourrions pas compter sur nos alliés, {n}dit Cassia en poussant un soupir de tristesse.{/n} Vous pouvez continuer votre rapport, paysan. »
languages.original_text: "Then Felek tore off his mask... precisely because he knew about the trouble on Rykad Minoris. He knew that none of our allies would come to our aid." {n}Cassia lets out a sorrowful sigh.{/n} "You may continue your report, peasant."

traits.locale_text: « Felek a tombé le masque, alors... précisément parce qu'il était au courant des problèmes sur Rykad Minoris. Il savait que nous ne pourrions pas compter sur nos alliés, {n}dit Cassia en poussant un soupir de tristesse.{/n} Vous pouvez continuer votre rapport, paysan. »

languages.text: “原来，费雷克之所以决定卸下伪装……正是因为他听说了小莱卡德的麻烦。他很清楚，我们的盟友根本不会来援助我们。”{n}卡西娅发出了悲伤的叹息。{/n}“你可以继续报告了，平民。”
languages.original_text: "Then Felek tore off his mask... precisely because he knew about the trouble on Rykad Minoris. He knew that none of our allies would come to our aid." {n}Cassia lets out a sorrowful sigh.{/n} "You may continue your report, peasant."

traits.locale_text: “原来，费雷克之所以决定卸下伪装……正是因为他听说了小莱卡德的麻烦。他很清楚，我们的盟友根本不会来援助我们。”{n}卡西娅发出了悲伤的叹息。{/n}“你可以继续报告了，平民。”

languages.text: 「それからフェレックがマスクを剥ぎ取り…彼はライカド・ミノリスでの問題を知っていたからです。我々の仲間は誰も助けには来れないと分かっていたんです」{n}カシアは悲しげにため息を漏らす。{/n}「報告を続けなさい、農民」
languages.original_text: "Then Felek tore off his mask... precisely because he knew about the trouble on Rykad Minoris. He knew that none of our allies would come to our aid." {n}Cassia lets out a sorrowful sigh.{/n} "You may continue your report, peasant."

traits.locale_text: 「それからフェレックがマスクを剥ぎ取り…彼はライカド・ミノリスでの問題を知っていたからです。我々の仲間は誰も助けには来れないと分かっていたんです」{n}カシアは悲しげにため息を漏らす。{/n}「報告を続けなさい」

languages.text: «Luego Felek se quitó la máscara... precisamente porque se enteró del problema surgido en Rykad Minoris. Sabía que ninguno de nuestros aliados acudiría en nuestra ayuda». {n}Cassia suelta un suspiro apesadumbrado.{/n} «Puede continuar su informe, plebeyo».
languages.original_text: "Then Felek tore off his mask... precisely because he knew about the trouble on Rykad Minoris. He knew that none of our allies would come to our aid." {n}Cassia lets out a sorrowful sigh.{/n} "You may continue your report, peasant."

traits.locale_text: «Luego Felek se quitó la máscara... precisamente porque se enteró del problema surgido en Rykad Minoris. Sabía que ninguno de nuestros aliados acudiría en nuestra ayuda». {n}Cassia suelta un suspiro apesadumbrado.{/n} «Puede continuar su informe, plebeyo».

languages.text: "Felek maskesini çıkardı o zaman. Rykad Minoris'teki sorundan haberdardı tabii. Hiçbir müttefikimizin yardımımıza gelemeyeceğini biliyordu." {n}Cassia kederle iç geçiriyor.{/n} "Raporuna devam edebilirsin avam."
languages.original_text: "Then Felek tore off his mask... precisely because he knew about the trouble on Rykad Minoris. He knew that none of our allies would come to our aid." {n}Cassia lets out a sorrowful sigh.{/n} "You may continue your report, peasant."

traits.locale_text: "Felek maskesini çıkardı o zaman. Rykad Minoris'teki sorundan haberdardı tabii. Hiçbir müttefikimizin yardımımıza gelemeyeceğini biliyordu." {n}Cassia kederle iç geçiriyor.{/n} "Raporuna devam edebilirsin avam."
